short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It adds a table of contents to Github's issue pages for quick browsing and content navigation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Github Issue TOC is a Chrome extension that automatically generates a table of contents on Github's Issue page and displays it in the right sidebar, helping users to quickly locate sections of content of interest, especially for those who build blogs and write long articles on Github.
